Room.Name: Necropolis Path
Room.ShortDescription: The north-south path curves near the southern end of the Fighter's Hall.
Room.LongDescription: The Walk of Lords is farther to the south and is a glittering display of the adage that you can take it with you. The Walk of Lords is a wonderful testimonial to the power of money, and the rich and powerful families of Oceancrest. The path continues both north and south from here.
